channel.title: tool on 社畜人生
channel.description: Recent content in tool on 社畜人生

item.title: HTML ascii 速查
item.description: 資料來源：https://dev.w3.org/html5/html-author/charref #ascii-search { width: 100%; font-size: 1.6em; color: #5e7579; font-weight: bold; background-color: #eee7d4; border: none; outline: none; padding: 0.1rem 0.5rem; } .result { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .card { margin-top: 1rem; width: 100%; text-align: center; display: flex; border-radius: 5px; background-color: #bfbbbb45; color: #000; } .card h1 { width: 110px; height: 85px; border-radius: 5px 0 0 5px; margin: 0.75rem; padding: 2rem; background-color: #fff; font-weight: bold; } .
